Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Oil consumption rate increase. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 10/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
